name: barocoALT
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(w2)), wa(w0, wn(w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(w2)), wa(w0, wn(w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wn(w2)), wa(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wn(w2), wn(w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wi(wn(w2), wn(w1))

|- wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wi(w1, w2)

|- wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wex(s0, wa(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))

comment: Alternate proof of ~ festino , shorter but using more axioms. See comment of ~ dariiALT . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 27-Aug-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
